title: Payday 2 All FTS updates (1-12) + MP V6 Fix
description:
This is all the updates needed to play online when applied to a BASE install of payday 2.

several from that torrent has claim

Updates:
1-12 and the 11 hotfix

install in this order:
-Update 1-10 AIO
-Update 11
-Update 11 Hotfix
-Update 12

MUST INSTALL IN THE ORDER OR YOU WILL MESS UP THE INSTALLATION

After the updates are all applied you next copy files from the fix folder to the install directory. Finally run the "RVFiX Launcher.exe" If you want to play online not the regular game shortcut. Run the regular shortcut if you just want to play offline.

Note: Before you want to play online you must install steam. As a recommendation make an extra account to use just for this purpose. Once you have steam running and logged in.
